casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Aaron D. STALLS. No. 221P15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. Aaron D. Stalls, for Stalls, Aaron D. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C. Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 1st of July 2015 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, New Hanover County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."
